fields.review: So... I saw this bike the other day on Amazon selling for $850 or so, and the MSRP is $1000, so I decided to come to this beautiful site to see if you had any bicycles, new or used. Lo and behold, I saw this sexy bicycle on sale for only $600 so I snatched it up. I've been riding it weekly and I really love it! Five stars all around.
